description: Performance budget for GCMC Platform - Enterprise Compliance Management System

FCP.description: First Contentful Paint - Time until first text/image is painted (ms)

LCP.description: Largest Contentful Paint - Time until largest element is visible (ms)

TTI.description: Time to Interactive - Time until page is fully interactive (ms)

TBT.description: Total Blocking Time - Sum of blocking time for long tasks (ms)

CLS.description: Cumulative Layout Shift - Visual stability score (lower is better)

SI.description: Speed Index - How quickly content is visually displayed (ms)

requests.description: Maximum HTTP requests per page load

alerts.performance: Email team if score drops below 90
alerts.bundle: Fail CI build if bundle exceeds budget by 10%

notes: Run 'bun run build:analyze' to analyze bundle size
Performance budgets should be reviewed quarterly
Budgets are based on average 4G mobile network (4Mbps)
